summary: The module defines Django model classes that support the core functionality of the GreedyBear application. One model represents a configurable honeypot used to emulate vulnerable services and record attacker interactions. The other model implements an Inversion of Control container that centralises service registration and resolves dependencies, facilitating modular object creation within the system.
business_intent: Enable the deployment of simulated vulnerable services to attract and monitor malicious activity while providing a flexible dependency management mechanism for the application's components.
